string.name: key__phone_pause
string.comment: Label for the Pause key in the telephone keyboard layout

string.name: key__phone_wait
string.comment: Label for the Wait key in the telephone keyboard layout

string.name: key_popup__threedots_alt
string.comment: Content description for the three-dots icon in a key popup

resources.string: Tre-prikket ikon. Hvis synlig, viser at flere tegn er tilgængelige ved længere tryk.

string.name: one_handed__close_btn_content_description
string.comment: Content description for the one-handed close button

string.name: one_handed__move_start_btn_content_description
string.comment: Content description for the one-handed move to left button

string.name: one_handed__move_end_btn_content_description
string.comment: Content description for the one-handed move to right button

string.name: media__tab__emojis
string.comment: Tab description for emojis in the media UI

string.name: media__tab__emoticons
string.comment: Tab description for emoticons in the media UI

string.name: media__tab__kaomoji
string.comment: Tab description for kaomoji in the media UI

string.name: emoji__recently_used__empty_message
string.comment: Message if no recently used emojis exist

resources.string: Ingen nyligt brugte emojis fundet. Når du begynder at skrive emojis, vil de automatisk blive vist her.

string.name: emoji__recently_used__phone_locked_message
string.comment: Message to show if phone is locked

resources.string: For at få adgang til din emoji-historik skal du først låse din enhed op.

string.name: emoji__recently_used__removal_tip
string.comment: Feature discoverability for removal of recently used emojis

resources.string: Pro tip: Tryk længe på nyligt brugte emojis for at fjerne dem fra denne visning igen!

string.name: emoji__recently_used__removal_success_message
string.comment: Toast message if user has long pressed emoji in recently used collection to remove it

string.name: quick_action__voice_input__tooltip
string.comment: IME stands for Input Method Editor and is indirectly equivalent to 'keyboard'.

string.name: quick_action__noop
string.comment: Noop=no operation; this action is only used as a placeholder in the actions editor drag and drop screen

string.name: settings__help
string.comment: General label for help buttons in Settings

string.name: settings__default
string.comment: General string which is used when a preference has the default value set

string.name: settings__system_default
string.comment: General string which is used when a preference has the system default value set

string.name: settings__home__ime_not_enabled
string.comment: Error message shown in Home fragment when FlorisBoard is not enabled in the system

resources.string: FlorisBoard er ikke slået til i systemet og er derfor ikke tilgængelig som inputsmetode i inputvælgeren. Klik her for at løse problemet.

string.name: settings__home__ime_not_selected
string.comment: Warning message shown in Home fragment when FlorisBoard is not selected as the default keyboard

resources.string: FlorisBoard er ikke valgt som standard inputmetode. Klik her for at løse problemet.

string.comment: Title of languages and Layout screen

string.comment: Label of Display language names in preference

string.comment: Title of subtype dialog when adding a new subtype

string.name: settings__localization__language_pack_title
string.comment: Title of the language pack manager screen for managing installed and custom language packs

string.name: settings__localization__subtype_edit_title
string.comment: Title of subtype dialog when editing an existing subtype

string.name: settings__localization__subtype_locale
string.comment: Label for locale dropdown in subtype dialog

string.name: settings__localization__subtype_no_subtypes_configured_warning
string.comment: Warning message that no subtype has been defined

resources.string: Det ser ud til, at der ikke er konfigureret nogle undertastaturer. I dette tilfælde faldes der tilbage på Engelsk/QWERTY!

string.name: settings__localization__subtype_error_already_exists
string.comment: Error message shown in subtype dialog when a subtype to add already exists

string.name: settings__localization__subtype_error_layout_not_installed
string.comment: Error message shown in subtype list when a layout is not installed, where %s will be replaced by the layout ID

resources.string: Gør bogstaver i ord store baseret på nuværende inputskontekst
Caps lock vil forblive aktiveret ved skift af tekstfelter
Tast to gange på mellemrum for at indætte et punktum efterfulgt af mellemrum

string.comment: Label of the For all languages entry in the language list

string.comment: Label for the shortcut in the user dictionary add/edit dialog

resources.string: Skriv ord ved at stryge fingeren igennem bogstaver
